1554997177_1CVLeFVQw2wWbBdpM5PtQhtzd7wjK.body: The details of your case are important, a skeptic would say there is no case and you are a digital bum. A pessimist would say that your case is about some awful choice you made and you deserve what you received, and an optimist would assume you fell on hard time through no choice of your own, a victim of circumstance. Everyone is capable of being a combination of all three, what attributes will your entreat inspire in your peers?

1554989632_1CFQMjPvz8m5BHtMnGyE7tRktdQ69.body: Assange is a brave, persecuted journalist, targeted by a consortium of ruling elite individuals, government, and corporate entities. He is a victim, I predict he will be dead within a year. The stakes are getting higher every day and the masses mired in apathy, don't lift a finger to support those who are trying to help like Julian.
